definition[0]: the written abbreviation of edited,  edition, or editor
definition[1]: forms the regular past tense and past participle of verbs. The past participle form is often used as an adjective
example[1]: I want, I wanted, I have wanted
example[2]: I show, I showed, I have shown
example[4]: a sound that echoed through the room
example[6]: a bearded man  (=a man with a beard)
